item.description:
Welcome to Parents Without Partners,

We are glad you found us through Meetup.com.  Our group is so much more than a meetup group.  Our meetups are private and only available to active members of our chapter, not just to anyone who signs on to meetup.

This Saturday meeting has been added to accomodate those who could not attend a Tuesday evening orientation.

You are eligible for membership in Parents Without Partners if you are a parent of one or more children; single due to death, divorce, separation, or never being married; and are of good character. Neither custody nor age of your child or children is a factor in eligibility. If you are considering membership in our chapter, you must attend an Informational Meeting/Orientation.

If you decide to join, yearly membership is $50.00, payable by cash or check at Informational Meeting/Orientation. Also, please bring the name, address, and telephone number of a professional person (or a sponsoring PWP member) who can verify that you are a single parent.

 [url=www.pwp817.com]Parents Without Partners[/url]

 

We hope you will come meet us soon to enjoy the benefits we have to offer you and your child(ren).

Questions?  Please leave a message at 978-930-6379 and your call will be returned.

Warmly,  Sandi
item.name: New Date added for Orientation - Parents Without Partners
